name: MiniGolf
description:
27 Levels


Currently 3 maps with each 9 levels makes a total of 27 different levels. Each with its individual challenges. Play on slippery ice or on the high mountains. Try not to fall down!

3 Modes


Choose between the relaxed round-based minigolf or the dynamic/extreme mode, where every one plays simultaneously and tries to be the first to hole in the ball, no matter what! Pure Chaos!

Up to 8 Players


Play minigolf with up to 8 Players. Invite your friends, regardless of if they are sitting next to you on the couch or if they playing online.

Play with items
Do you like to tease your friends? Just put a cow on their shooting lane or just start a gun fight. This is as crazy as it sounds. Trick your way into the golf hole by using extra items!

Steam Workshop


Create your own levels in the in-game editor and share them with the world within steam workshop. This will also give you access to many additional levels from the community. Join us now!
